name: "Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers" - The Pilot Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the device that turned the Power Rangers into children who required the help of the Alien Rangers?
questions.explanation:
Orb of Doom.

	Master Vile, who was the father of series regular villain Rita Repulsa, arrived near the end of season three of "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers" and as this series is a direct continuation of that one, he was set up as the villain for the mini-series. He brought with him the Orb of Doom, which turned back time and made all of the Rangers and other people in town children.

questions.text: There had been six Power Rangers. Was there an equal number of Aquitian Rangers?
questions.explanation:
No.

	There were only five Rangers that came from Aquatar. With the alien group there was no pink Ranger counterpart. The White Ranger on the alien team was a female and the team leader, unlike the earth version who up to that point had only been led by men.

questions.text: The alien Rangers did not use Zords, but instead called their giant fighting robots by what other name?
questions.explanation:
Battle Borgs.

	The Battle Borgs were controlled by thought and not from within like most of the "Mighty Morphin" Zords had been. This was also the first set of giant fighting robots that did not combine and form a larger "mega" version.

questions.text: What was the plan to destroy Zordon?
options: Trap him inside a small jar and send it off into space.
Have a monster beat him in battle.
questions.explanation:
Blow up the Command Center.

	Goldar and Rito Repulsor were given an implosion device and sent to destroy the Command Center. They laid the device at the base of the building, lit the fuse and ran off. Alpha was able to defuse the bomb and save the day.

questions.text: Which two Rangers were not picked up by the police?
questions.explanation:
Kat and Tommy.

	Four of the Ranger kids, along with Bulk and Skull, were picked up by the police for being out after curfew. Kat and Tommy managed to hide and escape from the police. They were able to work together and get the other Rangers out of the police station.

questions.text: What special environmental condition did the alien Rangers need to survive?
questions.explanation:
Water.

	Aquatar was a planet made up of entirely water. The alien Rangers needed to bathe in the special water quite often or else their lives would be forfeited. The waters of Earth were okay for a quick charge, but did not manage to keep them fully hydrated.

questions.text: Were the alien Rangers able to use the regular Rangers' Shogun Zords?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	As discussed with Zordon before the alien Rangers came to Earth, the Shogun Zords would be at the alien Rangers' command while on Earth. They were able to use all five Shogunzords and the White Falconzord to make up both combinations of the Megazord when their own Battle Borgs weren't enough to defeat a monster.

questions.text: Which giant robots were called upon first to fight the monsters?
questions.explanation:
Battle Borgs.

	The Battle Borgs were used to fight the five monsters that had each appeared. However, since they weren't quite as powerful as was needed, the Shogun Megazord was also called upon to end the fight. All five Battle Borgs and the Megazord destroyed the villains in one fell swoop.

questions.text: Who did Lord Zedd kiss near the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Goldar.

	After the alien Rangers defeated the five villains sent to Earth, Zedd was happy. He was happy that Master Vile was defeated and kissed the first of his cronies that was near him. Goldar was the closest, though his wife was also in the room.

questions.text: Defeated, Master Vile returned to his home planet at the end of the episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Master Vile was from the planet Gamma Vile. After the alien Rangers defeated his monsters, Master Vile threw a tantrum and left the solar system. Lord Zedd was pleased that his father-in-law had left the area. Zedd and Master Vile had never gotten along.
